title: Dunkmaster Darius (or maybe just darius a whole) glitch.
body: I was playing a 1v1 vs Gnar (my brother) when suddenly after doing a E and Q combo, I couldn't auto attack. We did tests repeatedly and that seemed to trigger it in our case. We were in Howling Abyss and this seems to be a game breaking problem. Riot, please fix this.

replies.body:
Hey Danthepatrick,

Thanks for the report! We're currently working on the issue.

Can confirm its only dunkmaster.

It's a shame. Bug has been here two patches. I just wanna dunk ;-;

Can also confirm that its only Dunkmaster that's bugged.

I'm actually so pissed about this that I haven't played league since I came across this bug several patches ago. Darius is my favorite champ, and Dunkmaster is my favorite skin. I don't want to be handicapped by my favorite skin.

This is a legendary skin, Riot. We deserve a quality product.

Happened to me too yesterday but i was 2v1.. you can fix it kinda by pressing a and then clicking. Still won that game    

DUNKIN IS IZI
I'm sad.. I was the first to notice it was still a bug and i got one comment xD
Yes my friend and I have the same issue.
It is not just dunkmaster. After darius uses apprehend, your character cannot move, attack or cast spells for 0.5 seconds. This has been a gamebreaking glitch since the last patch
